"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Employee Details"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "emp_id", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Employee ID"}, {"fieldname": "employee_name", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Employee Name"}, {"fieldname": "designation", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Designation"}, {"fieldname": "department", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Department"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "resident_id_numberqid", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Resident ID Number(QID)"}, {"fieldname": "date_of_joining", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Date of Joining"}, {"fieldname": "company", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Company"}, {"fieldname": "letter_head", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Letter Head"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": "Request Details"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "date", "print_hide": 0, "label": "Date"}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldtype": "Section Break", "label": ""}, {"fieldtype": "Column Break"}, {"fieldname": "terms", "print_hide": 0, "align": "left", "label": "I agree with these terms and I shall co-operate"}]
html:
{{doc.name}}

Employee Driving License Declaration

EMPLOYEE DETAILS

Date {{frappe.utils.format_date (doc.date or "")}}
Employee ID {{doc.emp_id or ''}} Employee Name {{doc.employee_name or ''}}
QID {{doc.resident_id_numberqid or ''}} Date of Joining {{frappe.utils.format_date (doc.date_of_joining or '')}}
Department {{doc.department or ''}} Designation {{doc.designation or ''}}

Self Declaration

1.I should work with Electra for minimum 2 years after getting license

2.If I resigned or terminated from the company before the above-mentioned period, the expense for the license can be deducted from the final settlement

3.If I did not get the license after the course completed, the expense for the license can be deducted from my salary.

Employee Signature
name: Driving License Declaration
